name: Jam Juice Line - Ice Sweet Mania
name_original: Jam Juice Line - Ice Sweet Mania
description:
Here comes the most juicy fruit match-3 game. Swap to match 3 or more succulent blueberries, fresh strawberries and appetizing grapes in Jam Juice Line - Ice Sweet Mania.
How to Play
- Swap and make matches of 3 or more fruits
- 4 or more fruits' blasting triggers power-ups and boosters
- Gather various fruits to win fruity levels before you run out of moves
